features.featureName: Azure AD Authentication Required for Data Plane Access
features.featureDescription: Service supports using Azure AD authentication for data plane access.
features.featureGuidance: Use Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) as the default authentication method to control your data plane access. Azure AD can be combined with Azure Media Services Key delivery and content protection services to secure playback of media content.  Samples and guidance can be found in the documentation.
features.customerActionsDescription: Use centralized identity and authentication system

features.featureName: Local Authentication Methods for Data Plane Access
features.featureDescription: Local authentications methods supported for data plane access, such as a local username and password.
features.featureGuidance: This feature is not supported to secure this service.
features.customerActionsDescription: Use centralized identity and authentication system
